channel.title: [Help 508] run.batch Error =/ [Help 508]
channel.description:
hey guys i just switched over to 508 and i have finished with my client so i need some help
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/error-1.jpg[/img]
thats the error and
-
[code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_06\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause[/code]
thats whats in the .batch file.
i dont know much about 508 so can anyone help me out?
thanks.

item.title: [Help 508] run.batch Error =/ [Help 508]
item.dc:creator: @confusing_coder confusing_coder
item.description:
@confusing_coder wrote:

What version of JDK Do you have??

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_06\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

Because this one is for JDK 1.6.0_06 If you do not have this version of JDK
Change the

1.6.0_06
to the version you have

so as i have 13 mine would say

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

Hope this helped…

Read full topic

item.title: [Help 508] run.batch Error =/ [Help 508]
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

x blitz x:

This isn’t a 508 problem, it’s a windows OS error message. http://google.com/

thanks , but other 508`s do still work that iv tried.
